Description: In the heart of Boston's Back Bay. Steps away from Boston Commons ,The Charles River, Newbury St , great restaurants ,coffee shops and much more. This apartment is in a gorgeous Brownstone. Newly renovated 1 bed 1.5 baths offers an open living first floor, hardwood floor, half bath and working fireplace. All new kitchen appliances with breakfast bar. The bedroom is located on the lower level with exposed brick, great closet space and a private full bath. Heat and hot water included Perfect for working from home. Laundry available in the building
